rawls.classes.camera¶

Classes

Camera(name, fov, focaldistance, lensradius) Camera class which store camera information
class rawls.classes.camera.Camera(name, fov, focaldistance, lensradius)[source]¶

Camera class which store camera information

name¶

{str} – name of the camera

fov¶

{float} – field of view information

focaldistance¶

{float} – focal distance of camera

lensradius¶

{float} – lens radius of camera
